item.description: Hi to all, our meetup dinner for February will be at Lena's Restaurant, Sat., Feb. 9, @ 7 pm. The restaurant is located at 655 John Fitch Blvd., (Rt. 5), in South Windsor. I guess you can tell I like Italian food but, they have a nice variety of everything! Hope to see you there. Judy C.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: East of the River Dining Out Group @ Lena's Rest., S. Windsor, Feb. 9th, 7 pm
